metadata.videoTitle: The Science & Treatment of Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)

text_en: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD) is a complex and often misunderstood mental health condition that impacts many individuals worldwide. Today, we delve into the intricacies of OCD, separating myths from facts, and exploring the various treatment options available. Join us as we navigate through the realm of OCD and gain a deeper understanding of this condition and its management.
text_zh: 强迫症（OCD）是一种复杂且经常被误解的心理健康状况，影响着世界各地的许多人。今天，我们深入研究强迫症的复杂性，将神话与事实区分开来，并探索各种可用的治疗选择。加入我们，浏览强迫症的领域，并对这种状况及其管理有更深入的了解。
